entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then west 20 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
